channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A ‘Timeout Box’ in an Elementary School Draws Outrage: ‘This is Not OK’

item.title: ‘Bring it on’ — Top Justice Department official responds to impeachment threat over redacted partial Epstein files
item.description: "We are doing everything we're supposed to be doing to comply with this statute," Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche said.

item.title: Australia Mourns Bondi Beach Shooting Victims
item.description: A week after gunmen killed 15 people at a Hanukkah celebration, hints of political divisions and anti-immigration rhetoric emerge in Australia.

item.title: 9 Killed in Mass Shooting at Tavern in South Africa
item.description: Around a dozen gunmen opened fire at bar patrons, the police said. A manhunt for the unknown assailants was underway.

item.title: Michele Singer Reiner: A Life Rooted in Activism and Listening to Others
item.description: Michele Singer Reiner was the guiding force in the lives of her family, stressing the need to help and respect one another.

item.title: U.S. Coast Guard Is Chasing an Oil Tanker Linked to Venezuela
item.description: U.S. forces had boarded a different tanker on Saturday. The actions signaled a crackdown on such vessels.

item.title: Freed From a Belarus Prison, a Nobel Peace Laureate Experiences ‘Oxygen Intoxication’
item.description: Ales Bialiatski, who shared the Nobel in 2022, described long hours of backbreaking work and stints in solitary confinement.
